articles.title: Trump’s victory over PBS and NPR ‘bias’ will be ‘devastating’ for rural areas, station leaders say
articles.description: Public TV stations will be “forced to make hard decisions in the weeks and months ahead,” PBS CEO Paula Kerger said Thursday, after the Senate approved a bill canceling all the federal funding for the network.
articles.content:
